error.2fa_missing: Two-factor authentication is required to enable vehicle control

2fa_missing.title: Two-factor authentication (2FA) required for vehicle control
2fa_missing.description: Please enable 2FA in your Rivian account and then reload the integration or re-configure the integration and remove any devices selected for vehicle control.
